title: Fashion Week in Sthlm S/S15 - Filippa K Woman — NORDIC STYLE MAG
text: Comfortable and chic is what Filippa K wants us to be next season and we are more than happy to agree.Staying true to the classic, minimalistic, silhouettes the new collection contains wearable pieces in different neutral colours, varying from black, navy blue and grey to beige, white and even a hint of light rose. We continue to love the d-ring belt and put it on anything – trousers, skirts, jackets and dresses. The wide trousers are a perfect piece for the cool scandi summer and we are thrilled to see sweaters and jackets in a S/S collection due to our Nordic climate. Our favorite spring shoes continue to be the black mules from last season, also shown at Filippa K.The Filippa K Woman is stylish and mature, yet effortless and relaxed with a discreet kind of confidence. about us & contact - instagram facebook twitter - listen to ‘the nordic podcast’ - © nordic style magazine 2022 designed by taka með stúdíó about us & contact   |   instagram facebook twitter   |   listen to ‘the nordic podcast’ © nordic style magazine 2022   |   designed by taka með stúdíó
